monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Arcane Shield
skills.description: Shield target for 4 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery (Buff)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield target for 5 x (90 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Arcane Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield target for 6 x (120 + 40% Magic) Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Augmented Shielding
skills.description: Every shield that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Buff.

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gemstone Barrage
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gemstone Rain
skills.description: 6 x 25% (150%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 35% (210%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Gemstone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Glitter
skills.description: Unique Aura: For each instance of "Gold Sense" in the party, every Monster in the party deals 5% more damage and receives 5% less damage.

skills.name: Gold Sense
skills.description: Increases Gold gained after combat by 10%. (If this Monster is participating in combat)

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Ion Beam
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (wind) Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Potion Mastery
skills.description: Aura: Potion heal effects are increased by 25%.

skills.name: Preemptive Shield
skills.description: Aura: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 75% of this Monster's Defense value to the whole party.

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Burst
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 140% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 175% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Soul Beam
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Whirlwind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Wonder Potion
skills.description: Aura: Potions also remove 4 Debuffs from the target and add 4 random Buffs. (2 for multi-target Items)
